info.name: Steam Charts - Simple
info.description:
Steam Charts is a really well built site, so there wasn't much to change.
But here are some changes to make the site some what more "usable".
info.additionalInfo:
!!! UPDATES !!!

V1.2 (October 8th, 2016) :
- Changed stats on game page to be more spread apart.

v1.1 (August 18th, 2016) :
- Changed content boxed to have a border-radius to 0.
- Removed ads!
- Everything on the site now has an animation! :D

V1.0 (August 2nd, 2016) :
- Initial release.
